thread.title: McCarthy expresses regret for Benghazi comments
thread.title_full: McCarthy expresses regret for Benghazi comments - San Francisco Chronicle

title: McCarthy expresses regret for Benghazi comments
text: Photo: Andrew Harnik, AP FILE - In this Sept. 30, 2015 file photo, House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy of Calif., left, walks on Capitol Hill in Washington. McCarthy says he regrets comments suggesting the House special committee on Benghazi has political goals. McCarthy says he never intended to make that suggestion. He says the purpose of the committee is to find out the truth and it has nothing to do with politics. FILE - In this Sept. 30, 2015 file photo, House Majority Leader... WASHINGTON (AP) — House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy says it was never his intention to suggest that the House Benghazi committee was created to undercut Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton, and he regrets suggesting the panel's purpose is political. FILE - In this Sept. 30, 2015 file photo, House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy of Calif., left, walks on Capitol Hill in Washington. McCarthy says he regrets comments suggesting the House special committee on Benghazi has political goals. McCarthy says he never intended to make that suggestion. He says the purpose of the committee is to find out the truth and it has nothing to do with politics. FILE - In this Sept. 30, 2015 file photo, House Majority Leader... WASHINGTON (AP) — House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy says it was never his intention to suggest that the House Benghazi committee was created to undercut Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton, and he regrets suggesting the panel's purpose is political.
